tuv.seg: Jobseeker's Allowance and work
Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist agus obair
• Calculating means from work
• Maoin ón obair a ríomh
• Spouse’s, civil partner’s or cohabitant's income from work • Further information
• Ioncam céile, páirtnéara shibhialta nó comháititheora ó obair
One of the primary conditions for getting Jobseeker’s Allowance is that you must be unemployed
Is ceann de na bunchoinníollacha chun Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist nó Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil go gcaithfidh tú a bheith dífhostaithe
However, you do not have to be totally unemployed – you must be unemployed for at least 4 days out of 7 consecutive days
Áfach, ní gá duit bheith dífhostaithe go hiomlán – caithfidh tú bheith as obair ar feadh 4 lá ar a laghad as 7 lá leanúnach oibre
You must also be available for and actively seeking work
Ní mór duit bheith ar fáil chun obair a dhéanamh agus ag lorg oibre go gníomhach
You can work and get Jobseeker’s Allowance if:
Mar sin féin, d'fhéadfá ioncam áirithe a thuilleamh ó fhostaíocht faoi chúinsí áirithe agus Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil. Mar shampla:
• Your days at work are reduced
• Tá d'uaireanta oibre laghdaithe
• You are laid off work temporarily
• Déantar thú a asleagan go sealadach
• You are self-employed but your level of business and income has reduced
• Tá tú féinfhostaithe ach tá leibhéal do ghnó agus d’ioncaim laghdaithe
• You can only get part-time or casual work
• Ní féidir ach amháin obair pháirtaimseartha nó ócáideach a fháil
You must meet all the other conditions for Jobseeker’s Allowance

Caithfidh tú na coinníollacha eile go léir maidir leis an Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a chomhlánú, mar shampla, caithfidh tú tástáil mhaoine a shásamh agus a bheith as obair ar feadh 4 lá ar a laghad as 7 lá
For example, you must pass a means test and you must also continue to look for full-time work
Ina theannta sin, ní mór duit leanúint agus bheith ag cuardach obair lánaimseartha
Jobseeker’s Allowance is a means-tested payment so your household income must be below a certain level to qualify
Is íocaíocht de réir tástáil mahoine Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
Your income from work is assessed and can affect your Jobseeker's Allowance payment
Caithfidh d'ioncam teaglaigh bheith faoi leibhéal áirithe chun cáiliú dó
However, only a certain amount of income from work is taken into account
Déantar measúnú ar d'ioncam ó obair agus féadfaidh seo tionchar a imirt ar íocaíocht do Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist
This is called your means from work
Tugtar maoin ó obair air seo
If you have a spouse, civil partner or cohabitant their income from work or other sources is also taken into account and can affect your Jobseeker’s Allowance payment
Má tá céile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó comháititheoir agat, cuirtear san áireamh freisin a n-ioncam ó obair agus féadfaidh seo tionchar a imirt ar íocaíocht do Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist chomh maith
Other sources of income can also affect your Jobseeker's Allowance payment
D’fhéadfadh foinsí eile ioncaim tionchar a imirt ar íocaíocht do Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist
Jobseeker’s Allowance is not taxable
Ní ghearrtar cáin ar an Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
Calculating means from work
Maoin ón obair a ríomh
Here we show you how to calculate your means from employment (not self-employment)
Léirímid anseo conas d'ioncam ó fhostaíocht (féinfhostaíocht as áireamh) a ríomh
You can find out how income from self-employment is assessed in our document Self-employment and unemployment
Faigh amach conas a dhéantar measúnú ar d'ioncam ó fhéinfhostaíocht sa doiciméad, Féinfhostaíocht agus dífhostaíocht
Assessable earnings from work
Tuilleamh inmheasúnaithe ó obair
The following items are always deducted from your gross earnings to get your assessable earnings from work:
Déantar na heisíocaíochtaí seo a leanas a asbhaint ó d'olltuilleamh chun do thuilleamh inmheasúnaithe a fháil:
• PRSI (social insurance contributions)
• ÁSPC (ranníocaíochtaí árachais shóisialta)
• PRSAs (Personal Retirement Savings Accounts)
• CCSpanna (Cuntais Choigiltis Scoir Phearsanta)
• AVCs (Additional Voluntary Contributions)
• RSBanna (Ranníocaíochtaí Saorálacha Breise)
There are 2 stages to calculating how work will affect your Jobseeker’s Allowance
Tá 2 chéim ann chun an tionchar a bheidh ag an ioncam ón obair ar mhéid do Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist a ríomh
Part 1: Find out if you have an entitlement to Jobseeker’s Allowance
Cuid 1: Deimhnigh an bhfuil tú i dteideal Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil
First, you must find out if you have an entitlement to Jobseeker’s Allowance
Ar dtús, tá ort a dheimhniú an bhfuil tú i dteideal Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil
To do this take your assessable weekly earnings and deduct €20 per day for each day you have worked up to a maximum of €60 (3 days)
Chun é seo a dhéanamh tóg do thuilleamh seachtainiúil inmheasúnaithe agus bain €20 in aghaidh an lae do gach lá a d'oibrigh tú suas le huasmhéid de €60 (3 lá)
Next get 60% of the balance
Ansin faigh 60% den fhuílleach
This amount is your weekly means from work
Measúnaítear é seo mar do mhaoin sheachtainiúil
Assessable weekly earnings - €20 per day = total x 60% = weekly means from work
Tuilleamh seachtainiúil inmheasúnaithe – €20 sa lá = iomlán x 60% = maoin sheachtainiúil ón obair
You then work out what the maximum Jobseeker’s Allowance payment for your situation would be
Ansin deimhníonn tú céard í an íocaíocht uasta den Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist i do chás
You get this by adding together the maximum payment for yourself plus any increases for a qualified adult and any qualified children
Is féidir é seo a ríomh tríd an íocaíocht uasta duit féin móide aon mhéadauithe i leith duine fásta cáilithe agus aon leanaí cáilithe a shuimiú
If your weekly means are less than this figure then your daily means are calculated to find the actual amount of Jobseeker’s Allowance you will get
Más níos mó do mhaoin sheachtainiúil ón uile fhoinse ná an íocaíocht uasta den Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist i do chás, ní bhfaighidh tú an Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
If your weekly means from all sources are greater than the maximum Jobseeker’s Allowance payment for your situation then you will not get Jobseeker’s Allowance
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise le fáil maidir le ráta an LCP do dhaoine faoi 26 bliain d’aois inár ndoiciméid faoi Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist
What happens if my partner is getting a social welfare payment?
Céard a tharlaíonn má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil ag mo pháirtnéir?

If your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant has a social welfare payment in their own right (except Child Benefit, Disablement Pension, guardian's payments, Supplementary Welfare Allowance, Domiciliary Care Allowance and half-rate Carer's Allowance) or is on a FET or VTOS course and getting a payment in their own right you cannot claim an Increase for a Qualified Adult for them

Má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil ag do chéile, pháirtnéir sibhialta nó do chomháititheoir as a gceart féin (seachas Sochar Linbh, Pinsean Míchumais, Íocaíochtaí Caomhnóra, Liúntas Leasa Fhorlíontaigh, Liúntas Cúram Baile agus Liúntas Cúramóra leathráta) nó má tá siad ag tabhairt faio chúrsa FET nó VTOS agus má tá íocaíocht á fáil acu as a gceart féin, ní féidir leat Méadú i Leith Duine Fásta Cáilithe a éileamh dóibh
This means that the maximum you can be paid is the maximum Jobseeker’s Allowance payment for a single person plus a half-rate allowance for each qualified child
Ciallaíonn seo gurb é an t-uasmhéid is féidir a íoc leat íocaíocht uasta an Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist le haghaidh duine singil, móide liúntas leathráta le haghaidh gach linbh cháilithe
(Your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant will get a half-rate payment for each qualified child with their payment.)
(Gheobhaidh do chéile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó comháititheoir íocaíocht leathráta le haghaidh gach linbh cháilithe lena n-íocaíocht.)
In addition only 50% of your combined means are taken into account in the means test for your Jobseeker’s Allowance - in other words your combined means are halved
Ina theannta sin, ní chuirtear ach 50% de bhur gcomh-mhaoin san áireamh sa tástáil mhaoine do do Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist – i bhfriotal eile – déantar bhur gcomh-mhaoin a ghearradh ina leath
(The other half will be taken into account in the means test for your partner's payment if your partner is getting a means-tested payment.)
(Má fhaigheann do pháirtnéir íocaíocht de réir tástála acmhainne, áirítear an leath eile sa tástáil acmhainne d’íocaíocht do pháirtnéara.)
You can claim an increase for your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant while they are taking part in a Community Employment (CE), Tús or Gateway scheme
Má ghlacann do chéile, pháirtnéir sibhialta nó chomhchónaitheoir páirt i scéim Fostaíochta Pobail, d’fhéadfá méadú a fháil dóibh
Their earnings from the scheme are assessed in the same way as earnings from insurable employment (and your combined means are not halved)
Déantar measúnú ar a thuilleamh ón scéim ar an mbealach céanna a dhéantar amhlaidh ar ioncam ó obair inárachais

However if you are claiming Jobseeker's Allowance and your spouse or partner is getting one of the social welfare payments listed below, the total amount paid cannot be more than would be payable if only one of you was claiming and the other was an adult dependant

Má tá Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist á éileamh agat, áfach, agus má tá ceann de na híocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh thíos á fáil ag do chéile nó do pháirtnéir, ní féidir leis an méid iomlán a íoctar libh beirt bheith níos mó ná mar a bheadh iníoctha dá mbeadh ach duine díobh ag éileamh íocaíochta agus dá mba cleithiúnach aosach an duine eile
• Disablement Pension (when paid with Injury Benefit or Incapacity Supplement)
• Pinsean Míchumais (nuair a íoctar é leis an Sochar Díobhála nó leis an bhForlíonadh Éagumais)
Part 2: Calculate how work will affect your Jobseeker’s Allowance
Cuid 2: An tionchar a bheidh ag an obair ar mhéid do Liúntais Cuardaitheora Poist a ríomh
If you are entitled to Jobseeker’s Allowance, you then calculate how work will affect your payment
Má tá tú i dteideal Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil, déan an tionchar a bheidh ag obair ar d'íocaíocht a ríomh
Calculate your average daily earnings
Déan do mheántuilleamh laethúil a ríomh
To calculate your average daily earnings get your total weekly assessable earnings from employment and divide by the number of days you worked that week (including Sunday)

Chun do mheántuillimh laethúla a ríomh, deimhnigh do thuillimh sheachtainiúla inmheasúnaithe ó fhostaíocht agus roinn iad faoin líon laethanta a d’oibrigh tú an tseachtain sin (an Domhnach san áireamh)
Total weekly earnings ÷ number of days worked = average daily earnings
Tuilleamh seachtainiúil iomlán ÷ líon laethanta oibrithe = meántuilleamh laethúil
Next calculate your daily means from work
Ansin, déan d'acmhainní laethúla ón obair a ríomh
To calculate your daily means from work, you must first disregard any income not taken into account
Chun d'acmhainní laethúla ón obair a ríomh, ní mór duit neamhaird a thabhairt ar ioncam ar bith nár cuireadh san áireamh
€20 is not taken into account for days worked
Is é an t-ioncam nach gcuirtear san áireamh ná €20 do na laethanta a oibrítear
Next get 60% of the balance
Ansin faigh 60% den iarmhéid
This is assessed as your daily means from work
Measúnaítear é seo mar do mhaoin laethúil
Average daily earnings - €20 = total x 60% = daily means from work
Meántuilleamh laethúil - €20 = iomlán x 60% = maoin laethúil ón obair
Finally, find your weekly means from work
Ar deireadh, deimhnigh do mhaoin sheachtainiúil ón obair
To find your weekly means from work, multiply your daily means by the number of days worked
Chun do mhaoin sheachtainiúil ón obair a dheimhniú, iolraigh do mhaoin laethúil faoin líon laethanta a oibríodh
Daily means from work x number of days worked = weekly means from work
Maoin laethúil ón obair x líon laethanta a oibríodh = maoin sheachtainiúil ón obair
Remember that this figure must be halved if your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant is getting a social welfare payment in their own right (see above for details)

Cuimhnigh gur gá an figiúr seo a ghearradh ina leath má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil ag do chéile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó do chomháititheoir as a gceart féin (féach thuas chun teacht ar shonraí)
Since 20 February 2013 work on Sunday is now included so:
Roimh an 20 Feabhra 2013 obair ar an Domhnach san áireamh anois, mar sin:
You include your earnings from Sunday when working out your assessable weekly earnings and when you are checking to see whether your assessable weekly earnings are over the limit
Cuireann tú do thuillimh ón Domhnach san áireamh nuair a bhíonn do thuillimh sheachtainiúla inmheasúnaithe á ríomh agat
You include Sunday when calculating your average daily earnings and when calculating your daily means or weekly means from work
4. Cuireann tú an Domhnach san áireamh nuair a bhíonn do mhaoin laethúil nó do thuillimh sheachtainiúla ón obair á ríomh agat

If you work part-time, your employer must pay you for the public holidays which you don’t work, as long as, you have worked at least 40 hours in the 5 weeks immediately before the week of the public holiday

Má oibríonn tú go páirtaimseartha, ní mór do d’fhostóir thú a íoc as na saoirí poiblí nach n-oibríonn tú, a fhad agus a d’oibrigh tú ar a laghad 40 uair sna 5 seachtaine díreach roimh sheachtain na saoire poiblí
If you are paid for a public holiday (whether you work on that day or not) this is counted as a day of work
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil ar íocaíocht le haghaidh saoirí poiblí ar fáil inár ndoiciméid, Saoirí Poiblí
If you get paid for a public holiday and don't work that day, it will be included in the number of days worked to find your weekly means from work
Má íoctar thú, áfach, as saoire phoiblí agus mura n-oibríonn tú ar an lá sin, beidh sé san áireamh i líon na laethanta a oibríodh chun do mhaoin sheachtainiúil ón obair a dheimhniú
Depending on your means, you can continue to get Jobseeker’s Allowance for the other days you do not work. If you work more than 3 days in a week you do not qualify for JA for that week
Ag brath ar do mhaoin, is féidir leat leanúint de Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil i leith na laethanta eile nach n-oibríonn tú
How much Jobseeker’s Allowance you get
An méid Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a bhféadfá a fháil:
Subtract your weekly means from the maximum Jobseeker’s Allowance payment for your situation to find out how much Jobseeker’s Allowance you will get
Bain do mhaoin sheachtainiúil ón uasmhéid den íocaíocht Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist do do chás chun a dheimhniú an méid den Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a gheobhaidh tú
Note: The maximum weekly rate of Jobseeker’s Allowance for your circumstances is the maximum rate of Jobseeker’s Allowance and any increases for your adult dependant and child dependants
Nóta: Is uasmhéid an Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist do do chás ráta uasta an Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist agus aon mhéaduithe i leith do chleithiúnaithe linbh agus aosacha

If your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant is getting a social welfare payment in their own right an increase for a qualified adult is not included in the maximum Jobseeker’s Allowance payment for your situation and you will only get a half-rate increase for each qualified child

Má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil ag do chéile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó do chomháititheoir as a gceart féin, ní áirítear méadú i leith leanbh cáilithe in íocaíocht uasta an Liúntais Chuardaitheora Poist do do chás agus ní bhfaighidh tú méadú leathráta do gach leanbh cáilithe
If you have other means in addition to means from work they will also be taken into account and will affect how much Jobseeker’s Allowance you will get
Má tá aon mhaoin eile agat de bhreis ar mhaoin ón obair cuirfear iad san áireamh freisin agus beidh tionchar acu ar an méíd den Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a d’fhéadfá a fháil:
You may find our Worksheet to help you calculate your means from work for Jobseeker's Allowance useful
D'fhéadfadh ár mBileog Oibre cabhrú leat do mhaoin ó obair a ríomh don Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
The definition of seasonal employment is that:
Forlíonadh Ioncam Teaghlaigh (FIT) agus Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil
• It is created annually as a result of a particular seasonal variation in the amount of work, and terminates at the end of that season
Má tá d’ioncam ó obair laghdaithe nó má tá tú ag oibriú go páirtaimseartha agus cúram á thabhairt agat do leanbh amháin ar a laghad, d’fhéadfá Forlíonadh Ioncam Teaghlaigh (FIT) a fháil
• The start and end dates may vary from season to season and from worker to worker, but overall there should be a clearly discernible beginning and end to the season
Ní mór duit 19 n-uaire ar a laghad oibre a bheith agat sa tseachtain (nó 38 uair sa choicís) agus ní mór do d’ioncam bheith faoi bhun méid áirithe
• The length of the season should not generally exceed six months
Ní féidir leat an FIT agus Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist a fháil ag an am céanna
In determining whether a person is involved in seasonal employment the nature of the business is investigated, as well as the nature of the person's employment
Is féidir le do pháirtnéir an FIT a fháil, áfach, fad atá Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist á fháil agat
Some of the typical areas where seasonal employments exist are turf harvesting with Bord na Mona, fish processing and hotels, restaurants and shops in areas where there is a limited tourist season
Is féidir leat cuairt a thabhairt ar d’Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh nó ar d’Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh is gaire duit chun a dheimhniú cén íocaíocht ba thairbhiúla duit
Spouse’s, civil partner’s or cohabitant's income from work
Ioncam céile, páirtnéara shibhialta nó comháititheora ó obair
Your spouse's, civil partner's or cohabitant's income from employment is assessed in the means test for Jobseeker’s Allowance
Déantar measúnú ar ioncam do chéile, pháirtnéara shibhialta nó do chomháititheora ó fhostaíocht sa tástáil mhaoine le haghaidh Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
Their income from work is assessed in the same way as your income from work (if any)
Déantar measúnú ar a n-obair ar an mbealach céanna a dhéantar amhlaidh ar d’ioncam ó obair (más ann dó)
To work out what your spouse's, civil partner's or cohabitant's means from work is:
Lena dheimhniú céard í maoin do chéile, pháirtnéara shibhialta nó do chomháititheora ó obair:
• Deduct €20 per day from your spouse's, civil partner's or cohabitant's assessable earnings for each day worked up to a maximum of €60 (including Sunday)
• Bain €20 sa lá ó thuilleamh inmheasúnaithe do chéile, pháirtnéara shibhialta nó do chomháititheora do gach lá a oibríonn siad a mhéid le €60 (agus obair ar an Domhnach)
• Next get 60% of the balance
• Ansin deimhnigh 60% den fhuílleach
This is assessed as his or her weekly means from work
Déantar measúnú air seo amhail a mhaoin/maoin sheachtainiúil ó obair
Assessable weekly earnings - €20 per day (maximum €60 for 3 days work) = total x 60% = weekly means from work
Tuilleamh inmheasúnaithe seachtainiúil - €20 sa lá (€60 le haghaidh 3 lá oibre ar a mhéid) = iomlán x 60% = maoin sheachtainiúil ó obair
Your spouse's, civil partner's or cohabitant's income from self-employment is fully assessed in the means test for Jobseeker’s Allowance and there are no disregards
Déantar measúnú ar ioncam do chéile, pháirtnéara shibhialta nó do chomháititheora ó fhéinfhostaíocht sa tástáil mhaoine le haghaidh Liúntas Curdaitheora Poist
Earnings are assessed as gross income less work related expenses over 12 months
Déantar measúnú ar thuilleamh amhail ollioncam lúide caiteachais obair-bhainteacha thar 12 mhí

The expected annual earnings from self-employment is divided by 52 to find your spouse's, civil partner's or cohabitant's weekly means from self-employment. Further information Getting Jobseeker's Allowance before 26 September 2007
Roinntear an tuilleamh bliantúil ag a bhfuil coinne ó fhéinfhostaíocht faoi 52 le maoin sheachtainiúil do chéile, pháirtnéara shibhialta nó do chomháititheora a dheimhniú ó fhéinfhostaíocht
